subject: Football
Height (Stature)
lead_paragraph: The N.F.L.’s shortest starting quarterback, Drew Brees has led the Saints to a 10-0 record and is defying notions of the prototype for his position.
snippet: The N.F.L.’s shortest starting quarterback, Drew Brees has led the Saints to a 10-0 record and is defying notions of the prototype for his position.
